title: [Temperature Check] – Deprecate Aave v1
body:
### Summary
This Temperature Check represents the intention of the Idle DAO to proceed to deprecate Aave V1.
The initiative consists of 9 actions, 6 used for Best-Yield pools and 3 for Risk-Adjusted ones.

### Motivation
Idle plans to complete the migration from Aave V1 to V2, and dismiss the old version of that lending protocol.
With no Idle funds currently allocated into V1 , this is a favorable timing to finalize the proposal.

Read the extensive motivations and quantitative rationale [here](https://gov.idle.finance/t/deprecate-aave-v1/565). 

### Details
To complete the migration, the Governance has to execute the following actions:

* Remove Aave V1 wrapper from idleDAI, idleUSDC, idleUSDT, idleSUSD, idleTUSD, idleWBTC Best-Yield pools (6 actions);
* Remove Aave V1 wrapper from idleDAI, idleUSDC, idleUSDT, RIsk-Adjusted pools (3 actions).

Due to the number of required actions (9), the proposal can be fully executed through one on-chain IIP.

### Voting Options
Please cast your vote on one of the following options:
**FOR**: Approve Aave v1 removal on 9 strategies
**AGAINST**: Do nothing
author: 0x2fa92128ecE3901395448bf62Dd5Ff6a35871540
